question:
With reference to recent activities in Indian Cricket, which of the following is / are correct observations?
  1. India has retained ICC Test Championship.
  2. Manu Sawhney has been appointed as new Chief Executive of ICC.
  3. K. Jain has been appointed as new Ombudsmen for BCCI.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Ever year ICC on 1<sup>st</sup> complete its yearly session and hand over money as prize to the teams who captured the top spot in different formats of Cricket. India retained this position and Championship for last three years with 116 points. India is followed by New Zealand and South Africa which stands at 108 and 105 points respectively. Manu Sawhney, media professional and former ESPN Star Sports MD, took charge as Chief Executive of the International Cricket Council (ICC) and will work along with Dave Richardson who will step down after the ICC Cricket World Cup gets over in month of July 2019. Retd. Justice D.K. Jain who has become the new Ombudsmen for BCCI will also take charge as Chief Ethnic Officer of BCCI.
